idea-plugin.name: AbacatePay Theme
idea-plugin.description:
AbacatePay Theme

A green-first theme for IntelliJ IDEs, based on the AbacatePay visual identity.

Available Themes:

  • AbacatePay Dark - Deep dark theme with vibrant green accents
  • AbacatePay Light - Clean light theme with natural green tones
  • AbacatePay Soft - Softer dark variant, easier on the eyes

Features:

  • Complete UI theming for all IDE components
  • Syntax highlighting optimized for readability
  • Consistent color palette across all variants
  • Support for all JetBrains IDEs

For more information, visit our GitHub repository.
